concept.title: AirClassroom Guest Refund Policy
concept.shortdesc: Here at AirClassroom, we hope that all of our guests will be able to fulfill their scheduled reservations. We do understand, however, that sometimes things come up, and we will be flexible with your adjustment needs.

conbody.p: What to do when you can't make it:
- The App has a built-in "swap" function where you can ineract with other users, and request to switch time slots with them
- This feature is entirely user-based, so we are essentially asking you to work the kinks out amongst yourselves

- Our official policy is that you may receive a full refund if the request to cancel is made 48 hours in advanceFor every 12 hour period after, the account owner will receive a 10% reduction from their refund up to 50%.
- As an administrator, you have 5 complimentary reservations in ShanksAfter 5 have been used, your reservations will be deducted from your salary unless otherwise indicated
